ygData.subject: Re: armor appearance
ygData.msgSnippet: a word on style: i see...i would hope that the vambraces and bp are the only black pieces...leaving everything else (greaves, boots, bracers, helm, gauntlets)
ygData.messageBody:
a word on style:

i see...i would hope that the vambraces and bp are the only black
pieces...leaving everything else (greaves, boots, bracers, helm, gauntlets)
red. i've always liked that type of color blend on my sk. looked especially
nice a black iron bp, arms and steel extremities.

kg


>From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: [shadowknight] armor appearance
>Date: Fri, 22 Oct 1999 12:17:40 -0500
>
>bathory was entirely correct, the bracers are a deep, blood red; darker
>than
>rubicite red. which means my rubi greaves now clash. urgh. but the
>vambraces
>are indeed black (black plate arms are now the ONLY visual thing unique to
>the shadow knight class..), so there are two different colors to our armor.
>but i think the effect is pretty cool tho: if bracers, gauntlets, and boots
>are blood red, in full darkforge we have the appearance of a badass in
>black
>plate, with arms soaked to the elbows in blood, and feet too! nasty evil
>shadow knights that we are ;) by the way, while meldrath and the minotaur
>hero can be defeated with just a lvl 40 sk and a lvl 49 ranger (found that
>out last night) it is VERY painful. the hero apparently was a hill giant in
>his former life. and he had an axe *pain*
>
>now back to cazic to get rid of these rubi pants..
>
>P.S. you get HELLUVA xp for doing these quests.. turn in the items even if
>you dont want armor, its great!
>
>Beld Demonblade
>Fennin Ro
>
>
